option.name: domain_name
option.description: Domain Name: for instance: hamidev.com or hamidbehnam.com

option.name: project_path
option.description: The Project Path section in the url: the final url is going to be something like this: hamidev.com/project_category/project_path, for instance hamidev.com/angular/102

option.name: deployment_branch
option.description: Deployment Branch, declares the source branch in the dest repository that we're gonna deploy to the server, master, qa, dev, ... .

option.name: dest_repo
option.description: The path to the project's dest repo, without https. for instance: github.com/HamidBehnam/hamidev-mobile-dev-env-angular-dest.git

command.script: cd / sudo rm -rf @option.src_project_name@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp sudo mkdir @option.src_project_name@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp echo @option.src_project_name@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp is created. cd @option.src_project_name@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp echo downloading the project. sudo git clone --single-branch --branch @option.deployment_branch@ https://@option.dest_repo@ .

if [ @option.deployment_branch@ = "master" ] || [ @option.deployment_branch@ = "main" ] then sudo rm -rf /my_apps/@option.domain_name@/@option.src_project_name@/* sudo rm -rf /my_apps/@option.domain_name@/@option.src_project_name@/ echo the destination is cleared. sudo mkdir -p /my_apps/@option.domain_name@/@option.src_project_name@/ echo the destination is created. cd /@option.src_project_name@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp sudo cp -a . /my_apps/@option.domain_name@/@option.src_project_name@/ else sudo rm -rf /my_apps/@option.deployment_branch@.@option.domain_name@/@option.src_project_name@/* sudo rm -rf /my_apps/@option.deployment_branch@.@option.domain_name@/@option.src_project_name@/ echo the destination is cleared. sudo mkdir -p /my_apps/@option.deployment_branch@.@option.domain_name@/@option.src_project_name@/ echo the destination is created. cd /@option.src_project_name@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp sudo cp -a . /my_apps/@option.deployment_branch@.@option.domain_name@/@option.src_project_name@/ fi
echo the artifacts are copied to the destination. sudo rm -rf /@option.src_project_name@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp echo the temp direcotry is removed.
